name: Interstellar Boo-Boo
description:
God has made a boo-boo when creating the solar system and left the planets all wrong.

As the master of space and time, it's your job to fix his mess!

OBJECTIVE

- Match 3 planets of the same type to destroy them

Each planet has a different mass. If the total mass of the system reaches 300, everything will collapse into a black hole

CONTROLS

You only use one button. Any of the below will work:
SPACE key | Left mouse button | A button (Xbox controller)
